description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, as well as a CSS stylesheet and the main App component. It then creates a React root and renders the App component within StrictMode into the DOM element with the id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into a DOM container.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
